entry.title: SISER Glitter Bundle - Make your Own Dozen
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Siser Glitter
Price: 47.40 - 136.80 (3 variants)

Having difficulty selecting a colour? 

Just starting and wanting to experiment with different colours?

The "Make your Own Dozen" Glitter bundle may be your solution!  You get to select 12 different colours in either the 10"x12" size or the 20"x12" size.  

Please select your 12 colours by clicking on the applicable checkboxes.

Unfortunately, pictures do not represent the depth of colour and the intensity of the sparkle offered by this product.

entry.title: Siser HTV Glitter Bundles (47 colours)
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Siser Glitter
Price: 98.70 - 326.65 (3 variants)

The full bundle of Siser Glitter HTV contains 47 sheets; one of each colour we have in our collection.  

Unfortunately, pictures do not represent the depth of colour and the intensity of the sparkle offered by this product.
